data.eml:eml: A revision of the Australian species of the genus Melobasis Laporte & Gory 1837 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae), Part 2 (Revision of the nervosa species group)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Levey, Brian (2018): A revision of the Australian species of the genus Melobasis Laporte & Gory 1837 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae), Part 2 (Revision of the nervosa species group). Zootaxa 4528 (1): 1-79, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4528.1.1
